name: opencode-claude-code-provider
description: OpenCode plugin for Claude Code (Agent SDK) provider - use Claude Code's subscription without API keys

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --external @opencode-ai/plugin --external @opencode-ai/sdk --external zod && bun build ./src/sdk-wrapper.ts --outfile ./dist/sdk-wrapper.js --target node
